item.title: Setup a Git 'dotfiles' repository
item.description: This post covers the basic steps to setup a Git bare repository for tracking local system config file changes. Also, the local repo can be pushed remotely to backup or sync with other systems. For more information, refer to this tutorial at Atlassian which goes into much greater detail.
